synopsis.text: To escape the monotony of his middle school existence and the clutches of insomnia, Kou Yamori embarks on nocturnal explorations of his town. One fateful night, he encounters the enigmatic Nazuna Nanakusa, who introduces him to the enthralling secrets of the night. Nazuna offers Kou an intriguing proposition: she promises to help him find contentment in his daytime life and enjoy the freedom of the night. However, her unconventional methods take Kou by surprise when she reveals herself to be a vampire and bites him. Despite this unexpected turn of events, Kou remains captivated by Nazuna's allure and the prospect of immortality. In order to fully embrace the vampire lifestyle, Kou must first fall in love with Nazuna. As they spend more time together, Kou becomes increasingly determined to win her heart and transform into a creature of the night. This captivating tale invites viewers to join Kou on his thrilling journey of self-discovery, love, and the pursuit of eternal darkness.
